name: 6-4-2 Wave Loading
autoregulated: yes (can do multiple waves if advanced)
overview_and_execution: Perform a set of 6 at moderate load, rest 2-3 min, 4 heavier, rest, 2 at near-max. Optionally do a second wave with slightly heavier loads if performance allows.
example_application: Deadlift: 6×315, 4×335, 2×355. If strong, do a second wave: 6×320, 4×340, 2×360.
important_notes: Stop if bar speed slows drastically. Great for bridging strength & hypertrophy. Typically 1-2 waves per session per lift.
